report.title: Explore records
report.description: Report designed for the explore records facility in iRecord.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id LEFT JOIN samples sparent on sparent.id=s.parent_id and sparent.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (sample_attribute_values vuser JOIN sample_attributes sauser on sauser.id=vuser.sample_attribute_id and sauser.deleted=false and sauser.system_function = 'cms_username' ) on vuser.sample_id =o.id and vuser.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (sample_attribute_values vuserp JOIN sample_attributes sauserp on sauserp.id=vuserp.sample_attribute_id and sauserp.deleted=false and sauserp.system_function = 'cms_username' ) on vuserp.sample_id =sparent.id and vuserp.deleted=false JOIN users ouser ON ouser.id=o.created_by_id AND ouser.id<>1 -- don't return records allocated by default to admin user #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND o.record_status not in ('D','I','R','T') AND ('#searchArea#'='' OR st_intersects(o.public_geom, st_geomfromtext('#searchArea#',900913))) AND (#ownData#=0 OR CAST(ouser.id AS character varying)='#currentUser#') #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence IDs to filter to.

param.name: currentUser
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: location_id
param.description: Provide the location to display records for

param.name: ownLocality
param.join: JOIN locations lfilter ON st_intersects(lfilter.boundary_geom, o.public_geom) AND lfilter.id=#location_id#

param.name: taxon_groups
param.description: List of taxon group IDs to view data for

param.name: ownGroups
param.join: JOIN taxon_groups tgfilter ON tgfilter.id=o.taxon_group_id AND tgfilter.id IN (#taxon_groups#)

column.name: taxon
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.preferred_taxon=o.default_common_name then o.preferred_taxon ELSE o.preferred_taxon || COALESCE(' | ' || o.default_common_name, '') END

column.name: recorder
column.sql: COALESCE(CASE w.id WHEN iwwa.from_website_id THEN COALESCE(vuser.text_value, vuserp.text_value) ELSE w.title || '->' || COALESCE(vuser.text_value, vuserp.text_value) END, CASE ouser.id WHEN 1 THEN null else ouser.username END)

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying) WHEN '#currentUser#' THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: strokewidth
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.entered_sref_system ilike 'osgb' THEN length(o.public_entered_sref) / 3 ELSE 1 END

column.name: fillopacity
column.sql: CASE WHEN o.entered_sref_system ilike 'osgb' THEN length(o.public_entered_sref) / 24.0 ELSE 0.4 END
